name: LaplacianRecursiveGaussian

members.name: Sigma
members.detaileddescriptionSet: Set Sigma value. Sigma is measured in the units of image spacing.

members.name: NormalizeAcrossScale
members.detaileddescriptionSet: Define which normalization factor will be used for the Gaussian\see RecursiveGaussianImageFilter::SetNormalizeAcrossScale

briefdescription: Computes the Laplacian of an image by convolution with the second derivative of a Gaussian.
detaileddescription:
This filter is implemented using the recursive gaussian filters

\li {EdgesAndGradients/LaplacianRecursiveGaussianImageFilter,Compute the Laplacian of an image}
